mapper.sql: jc.id as jc_id, jc.jpush_channel_code as jc_jpush_channel_code, jc.jpush_channel_name as jc_jpush_channel_name, jc.platform as jc_platform, jc.appkey as jc_appkey, jc.secret as jc_secret, jc.status as jc_status, jc.add_time as jc_add_time, jc.modify_time as jc_modify_time, jc.add_operator_id as jc_add_operator_id, jc.add_operator_name as jc_add_operator_name, jc.modify_operator_id as jc_modify_operator_id, jc.modify_operator_name as jc_modify_operator_name, jc.is_delete as jc_is_delete
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from pub_jpush_channel jc
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into pub_jpush_channel (id, jpush_channel_code, jpush_channel_name, platform, appkey, secret, status, add_time, modify_time, add_operator_id, add_operator_name, modify_operator_id, modify_operator_name, is_delete) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jpushChannelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jpushChannelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addOperatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addOperatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyOperatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyOperatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})

jpush_channel_code = #{jpushChannelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jpush_channel_name = #{jpushChannelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
